comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: This is not the Great White Fleet (the United States Navy's round-the-world tour) but the Royal Navy on the Australian Station, 1905-1911, (before the Royal Australian Navy arrived in Sydney in 1913). See the State Library of New South Wales copy of this photograph at: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=413153
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
After further research we have amended the caption as follows:

'Spectators viewing the US Navy's Great White Fleet in Sydney Harbour - HMS 'Powerful", Royal Navy Australian Station in foreground".

Thank you for your observations
